content: **crocheted top in drops muskat size s-xl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no r-754 yarn group b ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** s m l xl **materials** drops muskat from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100-150-150-150 g colour 76 light denim 50-50-50-50 g colour 08 off white 50-50-50-50 g colour 19 light grey **crochet gauge ** 22 treble crochets in width and 11 row vertically = 10 x 10 cm crochet hook drops crochet hook size 3 mm hook size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger hook if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller hook
